title: Any support appreciated!

embed.description: Hi guys! I'm Sera's Dragon (Sera), real name Nicola. I was interested in video production in After Effects and I love gaming so I decided to put the two toge...

body:
Hey so any support/feedback/suggestions are welcome and appreciated, but mostly I'd like it if some of you could take the time to check it out and see if you like the channel, nothing more. I don't expect you to subscribe I just wanna make videos people can enjoy and any feedback at all is gonna help me do that.

Thanks, Sera's Dragon.

(Sorry if this isn't the right place for this but I figured it counts as my creation)
